register.description: This register contains the IP revision code

bitfield.description: IP revision

register.description: This register contains the data to be transmitted.

bitfield.description: Reads returns 0
Transmit data (used in both HDQ and 1-Wire modes)

register.description: This register contains the data to be received.

bitfield.description: Reads returns 0
Receive data (used in both HDQ and 1-Wire modes)

register.description: This register provides status information about the module.

bitfield.description: Reads returns 0
BITFSM delay value in 1.33 µs steps. 0x0 value corresponds to 1.33 µs.
Single-bit mode for 1-Wire 0x0: Disabled 0x1: Enabled
Interrupt masking bit 0x0: Interrupts disable 0x1: Interrupts enable
Power-down mode bit 0x0: Clock disable (power down) 0x1: Clock enable
Go bit. Write 1 to start the appropriate operation. Bit returns to 0 after the operation is complete.
Slave presence indicator. Actual only just after initialization time-out. Used in 1-Wire mode. Read-only flag. 0x0: No slave detected 0x1: Slave detected
Write 1 to send initialization pulse. Bit returns to 0 after pulse is sent.
DIR bit, determines if next command is read or write 0x0: Write 0x1: Read
Mode selection bit 0x0: HDQ mode 0x1: 1-Wire mode
Reads returns 0
TX-complete interrupt flag. Set to 1 if cause of interrupt. Set to 0 when register read.
Read-complete interrupt flag. Set to 1 if cause of interrupt. Set to 0 when register read.
Presence detect/timeout interrupt flag. In 1-Wire mode, set to 1 if slave's presence detected. In HDQ mode, set to 1 if timeout on read occurs. Set to 0 when register read.
Reads returns 0
Start soft reset sequence. 0x0: Disabled 0x1: Enabled
Interconnect idle. 0x0: Module clock is free-running. 0x1: Module is in power saving mode: Clock is running only when module is accessed or inside logic is in function to process events.

register.description: This register monitors the reset sequence.

bitfield.description: Reads returns 0
Reset monitoring. 0x0: The module is currently performing its reset. When the module is in power-down mode, set to 0 to indicate this fact. 0x1: The module has finished its reset.
